channel.title: Amethlion - a mmorpg in construstion by me ( image warning )
channel.description:
hey,
well Amethlion is a game currently in hardcore development , the amethlion team consists of just me :( but im going at a steady speed and game is starting to come together :)
Here is a FEW screenshots to give you can idea of the game....i will post some more pics of the main town when its a lil more completed.
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img261.imageshack.us/img261/1786/amethlion13ys.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img283.imageshack.us/img283/238/amethlion23nw.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img108.imageshack.us/img108/4562/amethlion33mz.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img246.imageshack.us/img246/2056/amethlion43au.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][img]http://img289.imageshack.us/img289/7979/amethlion100fs.png[/img][/URL]
also please check out the forums and post some ideas or commments :0[/center]
[center]http://amethlion.16.forumer.com/ [/center]

item.title: Amethlion - a mmorpg in construstion by me ( image warning )
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

look out for the new update the dungeons of Afeilia it will be out soon, and shortly after it will be the first beta test, here is a lil info about the new update....

[center]The dungeon's of Afeilia was originally a place of worship before it was overun many years ago by a savage orkish raid in an attempt to seige it. The ork's where defeated but at the cost of many lives and know the dungeon is un-attended and its hidden treasures lost forever.

If you enbark into its gloomy dephs you will allmost certainly never return, for few who enter ever come out to tell the tale...... [/center]

o yes and the site logo
http://amethlion.16.forumer.com/index.php

has just had a re-vamp so be sure to check it out

Read full topic

item.source: Amethlion - a mmorpg in construstion by me ( image warning )

item.title: Amethlion - a mmorpg in construstion by me ( image warning )
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Pfft, Who knows with him. I think he got it resolved, I think

He made me post it, so i dont know the story. I'd give you a bunch of good 3d models, but on the author's request I am not handing them out to anyone. When the pro version comes out, I'll be most likely ripping a few things. I am excited for it.

OOOOOOOOOOOO another MMORPG!!! What language is it in?

The realmcrafter engine was written in blitz3d as well, and is based off ckob's engine, and it just so happens Afelhem is also based off his engine as well, it's opensource and free now, can't remember where to get it though. Btw, solemn you should scale down the dirt texture a bit, it looks kinda blurry.

Read full topic

@solemn_wishes wrote:

hows afellhem going btw, i heard paypal screwed up and victor got blamed or something?

item.source: Amethlion - a mmorpg in construstion by me ( image warning )

item.title: Amethlion - a mmorpg in construstion by me ( image warning )
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

solemn wishes:

dam that sucks, ya i finnaly got it lol...after like 2 days of begging for it i was really surprised about the ammount of shit u get in it, if you bought it all seperatly it would cost alot more?

Yeah the content that it comes with is amazing, if you purchased it all it would cost a lot. It's too bad their 3d models(most of them) are encrypted. I would have liked to use them on other things.

Good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Amethlion - a mmorpg in construstion by me ( image warning )
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

dam that sucks, ya i finnaly got it lol...after like 2 days of begging for it i was really surprised about the ammount of shit u get in it, if you bought it all seperatly it would cost alot more?

i hate the way the engine takes ages to do anything, and the mouse slows down by alot but other than that its kewl.

Read full topic
item.source: Amethlion - a mmorpg in construstion by me ( image warning )

item.title: Amethlion - a mmorpg in construstion by me ( image warning )
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I see you bought realmcrafter finally Dont tell them I stole all their textures How do you find the engine? I thought it kinda stank but I still play with it now and then.

Ah well I just got myself a new texture pack. We were using solstar's textures because we thought they were royalty free, but they are licenced only to RC games

Read full topic
